description.desc: The strongest of all Electric-type attacks. Has a one-in-ten chance of paralyzing the target.
Strongest of all Electric-type attacks. Has a one-in-ten chance shot at paralyzing the target.
An attack that may cause paralysis.
A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.*Strikes the foe with thunderbolt. It may paralyze.*
A brutal lightning attack that may also leave the foe paralyzed.
A lightning attack that may cause paralysis.*Strikes the target with a thunderbolt. It may paralyze.*
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the foe to inflict damage. It may also leave the target paralyzed.
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.
A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
